title: Oozi Earth Adventure v1.2-ALiAS

Oozi Earth Adventure v1.2-ALiAS

Oozi: Earth Adventure is a classic 2D platformer with old school gameplay, with no puzzles, no punishment, just 100% pure classic platforming fun! Its most prominent features are HD visuals and beautiful hand-drawn art, but despite its visual style, it is also good fit for hardcore gamers due to its optional Hardcore DifficultyÃ¢â€žÂ¢ and Challenge ModeÃ¢â€žÂ¢.
